overview:
Larry Seppanen was a professional Trumpet player the first half of his life, then went into the network marketing industry and has been with Market America as an Independent Unfranchise Owner for 10 yrs.

Larry helps people develop a side residual income in addition to their present income, or some work full-time.

People that are interested in having their own online business and being mentored by Larry are people that want to have a full-time income, but work part-time with their own online business with Market America. They can accomplish this in 2-3 yrs, working part-time.

Market America has over 50 million products and services on their Portal, just acquired Bill Gates backed shop dot com, in fact, Tech Crunch has an article describing this: http://techcrunch.com/2010/12/15/market-america-acquires-bill-gates-backed-shopping-site-shop-com/

Market America has 69 quarters of growth, an A+ BBB rating, and is positioned to be the #1 Internet Retailer in the world.

I hope you contact me for more info.

Thanks!
